keyMoments.title: Whitebeard's Massive Shockwave
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard demonstrates the devastating power of the Gura Gura no Mi by unleashing a massive shockwave attack upon entering the plaza.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases why the Gura Gura no Mi is considered the strongest Paramecia-type Devil Fruit.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Saves Ace with Sand Powers
keyMoments.description: Crocodile uses his Suna Suna no Mi powers to strike down the executioners and save Ace from execution.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Crocodile's mastery of his sand powers and his willingness to use them against the Marines.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile's Logia Defense
keyMoments.description: After being decapitated by Doflamingo, Crocodile uses his Logia abilities to reform and continue fighting.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the defensive capabilities of Logia-type Devil Fruits.

keyMoments.title: Doflamingo Attacks with Strings
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo uses his string powers to slice Crocodile's head during their confrontation.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the lethal cutting ability of Doflamingo's string powers.

keyMoments.title: Kizaru's Light-Speed Attack
keyMoments.description: Kizaru uses his light-speed abilities to effortlessly catch up to Luffy in Gear Second and knock him down.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming speed advantage of the Pika Pika no Mi.

keyMoments.title: Aokiji's Ice Attack
keyMoments.description: Aokiji attempts to finish off Luffy with an ice attack before being stopped by Marco.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Aokiji's ruthless efficiency in combat.

name.japanese: トリトリの実 モデル：不死鳥
name.romanized: Tori Tori no Mi, Moderu: Fushichō

keyMoments.title: Marco's Phoenix Speed
keyMoments.description: Marco uses his phoenix abilities to move faster than Boa Hancock and kick Aokiji away from Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Marco's exceptional speed and combat prowess in phoenix form.
